name: AWS-DATA-STREAMING
desc: It aims to design and implement a robust data processing system. That leverages Amazon Kinesis in order to process and analyze real-time data streams.

name: SkyCast
desc: It provides users with up-to-date weather information for a specific location, including the current temperature, hourly forecast, daily forecast, and weather conditions..

name: MathWebApp
desc: The focus of this endeavor is on utilizing various Amazon Web Services (AWS) to create a seamless and efficient math web application..
